mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_name, p.planning_name, p.planning_status, p.reg_date, f.file_url FROM planning p JOIN file f ON p.planning_seq = f.planning_seq JOIN employee e ON e.employee_seq = p.employee_seq WHERE p.planning_seq = f.planning_seq;

SELECT e.employee_name, p.planning_name, p.planning_content, p.planning_status, p.reg_date, f.file_name, f.file_url FROM planning p JOIN file f ON p.planning_seq = f.planning_seq JOIN employee e ON e.employee_seq = p.employee_seq WHERE p.planning_seq = #{planningSeq};
